SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

commodities.simulator
Class TestSimulator

java.lang.Object
  commodities.simulator.TestSimulator
public class TestSimulator
extends Object

The TestSimulator simulates the daily actions of the commodity program user for a specific test. It makes decisions on buying and selling contracts based on the analysis done within the commodities program. An exception to the daily actions is that all orders are automatically filled on the next day's opening value unless a stop loss was enacted. A stop loss will be sold at the stoploss price if that day's prices span the stop loss amount. Otherwise, the open price of the next day will be the stop loss out price. Stop loss prices are set by the test. Tests that do not supply stop loss prices will not have contracts sold based on stop loss amounts. At the end of the simulator run, all open orders are resolved on the closing price of the last day. TEST OPTIMIZATION ----------------- A technical test will start the simulator for its test only. The simulator will start from the first day of data available for the commodity that the test is being optimized for. The simulator will advance the date one day at a time (skipping weekends) until the current date.

Since:
1.00
Version:
1.00

J.R. Titko

Constructor Detail

TestSimulator

public TestSimulator(Contract contract,
                     TechnicalTestInterface test,
                     StatsAbstract stats)
This constructor will perform a simmulated run using only the one technical test requested. The length of the simulated run will be over the range of all available data.

Parameters:
contract - The contract to run the test over.
test - The test to be processed.
stats - The statistical data to process for the test.

TestSimulator

public TestSimulator(Contract contract,
                     TechnicalTestInterface test,
                     StatsAbstract stats,
                     Date lastDate)
This constructor will perform a simmulated run using only the one technical test requested. The length of the simulated run will be over the range from the start of the data to the given last date.

Parameters:
contract - The contract to run the test over.
test - The test to be processed.
stats - The statistical data to process for the test.

processRecommendation

private void processRecommendation(Contract contract,
                                   int buySellRec,
                                   Date purchaseDate,
                                   double purchasePrice)
Process a recommended buy or sell order by checking existing orders for an offsetting order and if none is found, adding it to the list. If an offsetting order is found, the profit/loss is calculated and the offsetting order is removed from the list.

Parameters:
contract - The contract to be bought/sold.
buySellRec - The buy/sell recommendation.
purchaseDate - The date the contract was purchased.
purchasePrice - The price of the contract was purchased for.

calculateProfit

private void calculateProfit(Contract contract,
                             double buyValue,
                             double sellValue)
Calculate the profit/loss of a trade and record the results appropriately.

Parameters:
contract - The contract that has been bought and sold.
buyValue - The buy price of the contract.
sellValue - The sell price of the contract.
